text: Question 59 H 0 MARKS Your Time Taken: 4m50s Avg Time Taken By Others: Im 41s Attempt Accuracy: 31% Types Of Cache Memory Consider 4-way set associative cache having capacity 128 KB. The block size is 512 B. CPU generates 24 bit physical address to access the data. Each tag comprises of 3 bits for additional control information. What is the tag directory size in the cache? (in bytes)
